description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission 21/00646/FUL (Alterations to existing 3 storey building at ground, first and second floors. Retention of bar (Sui Generis) and office (Class E) with reconfiguration to provide new flexible Class E units, extension to existing office and 5 additional storeys to provide 70 serviced accommodation units (Class C1) with associated works and public realm improvements.) to allow internal reconfiguration and alteration to window positions.
site_name: St George's Court 4 St George's SquareNew MaldenKT3 4HG
